16+: We require you to be 16+ because of the nature of the show. If you are shown to be younger than 16, you will be banned without hesitation.

Be respectful: This means no mean, rude, or harassing comments. Treat others the way you want to be treated.

No spamming: Do not send a lot of small messages right after each other. These disrupt chat and make it hard to scroll through the server.

No NSFW: Do not post NSFW, even if its just suggestive. Posting art with characters having things like bongs *are* okay, just no bobs and vegina.

No advertisements: No invasive advertising, whether it be for other communities or streams. You can post art in <#1254315576013226004>.

Follow the Discord Community Guidelines: Respect the general Discord Community guidelines.

No sharing or distributing illegal drugs: This should be obvious, but distributing illegal drugs or controlled substances is strictly prohibited on the server.

Have Fun: Have fun in the server! Make some friends!
